::: {.unit-reading}
# Reading

## Variables and types

Python uses dynamic typing. You can assign values to names and inspect their types when needed.

## Data structures

Lists, dictionaries, and tuples are core building blocks. They let you group and organize data.

## Control flow

Use if, for, and while statements to control the flow of your programs.

## Functions

Functions let you package reusable logic. Define them with def and return values with return.

::: 
<!-- end unit-reading div -->
